page.title: 13NEW MOTORWAYS NEAR EPPING
page.content: Epping's major{motorway interchange}is at the south_east of Epping. The M25 brings vital communication links from north,south,east,and west together. In 1985 the M25 is nearly completed. The section that is to pass near the M1 _ the last section of the M25 _ will cost{Â£21,000,000}to build. The M25 orbital motorway reduces by 10% the amount of traffic through Epping. The recent decision to expand {Stansted airport}will mean more traffic on the{M11}and{M25,}house prices will rise, and there will be pressure on green belt land. After 18 months in operation the M25 is used to 60% of its capacity. About {57,000}vehicles use it every day. Not all people in the Epping area welcome the M25, particularly those affected by{noise and pollution. (cont.)
